  • provide auth token of a Firebase installation *
  • provide a API to GDPR-delete a Firebase installation * + * + * @hide

nodes.bodyText: @vkryachko Should the class members also be public to be documented on firebase site?
Yes, and since this is an interface, all of its methods are public. Also note my other comment on this interface, I don't think it should be documented
I think you'd want to hide this interface and instead have FirebaseInstallations exposed. This is consistent with how iid has it documented.
I think getToken() was part of the API-reviewed, no?

nodes.bodyText:
This one was part of API review as well, although there you called it getExpirationTimestamp().
Overall I'd suggest you go through all API's and compare them with the API review, thanks.
for getExpirationTimestamp() will update the  AP review doc. Updated the FIS SDK code getToken(boolean) as per the api review.
